content: instructions it is very easy and simple pattern i made step by step picture tutorial for the guide in this pattern i have no added difficult stitches in this pattern the double_crochet together i explain in the description below to starting the pattern fist see the abbreviations and then follow the pattern to the same when you working in the front first put the stitch marker or pin it the stitches and then start in one side to the other when you completing the front don t remove the stitch marker and then starting work into the back side i hope you will enjoy making this pattern and also hoping that you will share your feelings in the comments so don t forget and enjoy the new pattern
